text: Kathy Mattea is the debut album by American country singer Kathy Mattea. It was released in 1984 (see 1984 in country music) on Mercury Records. It includes the singles "Street Talk", "Someone Is Falling in Love", "You've Got a Soft Place to Fall", and "That's Easy for You to Say". The song "(Back to the) Heartbreak Kid" was later released in 1986 by Restless Heart from their self-titled debut album. ==Track listing== # "Street Talk" (Lee Domann, Ralph Whiteway) – 2:44 # "Someone Is Falling in Love" (Lee Domann, Pebe Sebert) – 3:05 # "You've Got a Soft Place to Fall" (Kerry Chater, Bob McDill, Hunter Moore) - 3:02 # "Takin' the Givin' Away" (Bob DiPiero, J.
